title: Multiple-use protected areas are critical to equitable and effective conservation
abstract: Given their substantial contributions to meeting area-based targets, we review evidence of multiple-use protected areas in meeting global policy goals. We found that multiple-use and other protected areas provide important environmental and socio-economic benefits that are needed to achieve the 2030 target.

title: Biological life history and farming scenarios of marine aquaculture
abstract: This study assesses how biological life history traits and current farming scenarios for marine aquaculture can help reduce fishing pressure on wild marine stocks. We examine trade-offs...
